job description:
Responsibilities

As a member of the Adobe Stock team, you will work on building and optimizing state of the art machine learning solutions, leveraging data mining, deep learning, content understanding, language understanding, and more. You will prototype and integrate new Machine Learning based approaches to deliver more personalized and delightful experiences to our customers.

You will independently design solutions as well as partner in a team environment across organizations. You will identify new ideas to analyze and evolve existing solutions and ML algorithms, develop new features, retrain and customize models, and benchmark possible solutions using platforms such as Adobe Sensei.

The ideal candidate will have a blend of science and engineering skills with a proven track record of solving critical engineering problems through strong analytical/quantitative and engineering skills.

What you need to succeed
  • BS/MS in Computer Science
  • Fundamental understanding of machine learning concepts including developing models and tuning the hyper-parameters, as well as deploying models and building ML services
  • Understanding of state-of-the-art Machine Learning techniques, Deep Learning, Recommendations and Computer Vision
  • Experience with data processing and visualization
  • Proficient knowledge in Python
  • Experience with frameworks like Sklearn, TensorFlow, Keras, Caffe or PyTorch
  • Experience developing full stack web sites and services using Node, PHP, JavaScript, HTML, and CSS
  • Have strong communication skills, analytical and problem-solving skills, the ability to work independently, and a strong focus on quality.
At Adobe, you will be immersed in an exceptional work environment that is recognized throughout the world on Best Companies lists. You will also be surrounded by colleagues who are committed to helping each other grow through our unique Check-In approach where ongoing feedback flows freely.

If you’re looking to make an impact, Adobe's the place for you. Discover what our employees are saying about their career experiences on the Adobe Life blog and explore the meaningful benefits we offer.

Adobe is an equal opportunity employer. We welcome and encourage diversity in the workplace regardless of race, gender, religion, age, sexual orientation, gender identity, disability or veteran status.
